collectible.title: Aoba's Bow
collectible.text: She gave it to you after the game was over. It has a faint scent of her lingering on it.

collectible.title: An Unforgettable Memory.
collectible.text: Remember that time when Aoba got so pissed that she dropped the F-bomb? Now THAT was unexpected.
collectible.unlock:
Aoba needs to lose 4 hands in a row.
Note: She cannot be wearing her "In Development" costume.

collectible.title: Black Coffee
collectible.text: The most adult drink there is!
collectible.unlock: Have Aoba correct 4 different characters about her age.
